ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So woe to those who do salat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Woe, then, to those who pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So ruin is to those offerers of prayer –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, woe unto those performers of Salah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So woe to the praying ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So woe to those that pray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So woe to those who pray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Woe, therefore, Unto such performers of prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So woe unto those performers of Salat (prayers) (hypocrites),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So woe to those who pray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So woe to those who pray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [107:4] So woe to them who pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ah, woe) severe torment in the Fire (unto worshippers) unto the hypocrites
